author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: حمل نمودی یشهد بحبّی ایّاک کلّ الذّرّات ای علی این ندایت بسیار محبوب است بنویس و بگو و بخوان ناس را بشطر پروردگار عالمیان بحرارت و جذبی که
translation: Say: O my Lord, my Best-Beloved, the Mover of my actions, the Lode Star of my soul, the Voice that crieth in mine inmost being, the Object of mine heart’s adoration! Praise be to Thee for having enabled me to turn my face towards Thee, for having set my soul ablaze through remembrance of Thee, for having aided Me to proclaim Thy Name and to sing Thy praises.
